title.narrative: F.a: Organising and Strengthenin Organisation Structure

description.narrative: The project will strengthen organizing in key service sectors of ASPEK. Special focus will be given to activating women and youth to trade union work. Capacity building and campaigning is intended to increase awareness on the importance of paying membershi p fees as well establishing check-off and percentage systems for collection of membership fees. New element is the capacity building on collective bargaining and strengthening of branch, regional and sectoral structures of ASPEK. The challenge of ASPEK rem ains to be weak organizing, structural dispersion and low financial sustainability which would be needed in order to combat the ever-growing challenges of working life. Long-term development objective for ASPEK is to be a strong and financially sustainable trade union that is able to effectively enhance the rights of its affiliates on branch, regional, sectoral and national level. As results of the project it is expected that six new sectoral structures are established, nine regional structures are establis hed/strengthened, twelve new unions join in ASPEK, women participation increases especially on national level, percentage system and membership fee coverage increases, new collective bargaining agreements are signed and three sectors succeed in having join t tripartite recommendations. The beneficiaries of the project are the unorganized workers of service sector in Indonesia, ASPEK affiliate unions, leaders and activists on local, regional and national level (especially women and youth). Project partners ar e UNI and ASPEK.
